risk_criteria.medium: pSRT 60-65 OR signal_score < 55 OR source tier 3
risk_criteria.low: pSRT >= 65 AND verifiable source AND quantitative data present

flagged_signals.title: Gen Z: 40% Openly Discuss Salaries, Breaking Workplace Norms
issues: Tier 3 source (Employer Branding News) - limited credibility verification
Specific percentage (40%) lacks methodology or sample size
flagged_signals.recommendation: Cross-validate with reputable HR research firms (Gallup, SHRM, Deloitte)

flagged_signals.title: 72% of Gen Z Would Leave Jobs Without Flexible Work Policy
issues: Tier 3 source (Employer Branding News) - same as SIG-052
No sample size, methodology, or geographic scope provided
flagged_signals.recommendation: Seek primary survey data from LinkedIn, Glassdoor, or academic sources

flagged_signals.title: Gen Z Choosing Spirituality Over Nightlife Globally
flagged_signals.recommendation: Cross-reference with Pew Research, McKinsey consumer surveys

flagged_signals.title: Quantum Sensing Commercialization Accelerating
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with physics journals, defense technology publications

flagged_signals.title: Middle East Defense Tech Consolidation
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with Jane's Defence, SIPRI databases

flagged_signals.title: Solid-State Batteries Mass Production Timeline
issues: Timeline claims often overoptimistic in battery tech
Multiple previous false positives in solid-state battery announcements
flagged_signals.recommendation: Cross-validate with BloombergNEF, manufacturer press releases

flagged_signals.title: South Africa Faces AI Readiness Crisis
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with IMD, WEF competitiveness reports

flagged_signals.title: Africa's Tech Ecosystem Growing: 160 to 300+ Defense-Tech Startups
issues: Defense-tech in Africa claim needs verification
flagged_signals.recommendation: Cross-check with Partech Africa, Briter Bridges data

flagged_signals.title: Error-Correction Technology Brings Quantum Computing Closer to Reality
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with Nature, Science publications, IBM/Google announcements

flagged_signals.title: BRICS Expansion Impact on Global Trade
flagged_signals.recommendation: Cross-reference with IMF, World Bank trade data

flagged_signals.title: Middle East Attracting $100B+ Annually in Energy/Renewables by 2026
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with IEA, IRENA investment tracking

flagged_signals.title: European Regulatory Pressure on AI Development
issues: General claim needs specific regulatory citations
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with EU AI Act official documents

flagged_signals.title: Spiritual Wellness Apps Market Growing 14.66% CAGR to $9.91B by 2035
flagged_signals.recommendation: Cross-validate with Grand View Research, Statista

flagged_signals.title: Global Policy Trends Signal Increasing Fragmentation
issues: Broad geopolitical claim needs specific evidence
flagged_signals.recommendation: Reference specific policy actions, trade barriers

flagged_signals.title: US Policy Reforms to Expedite Space Mission Authorizations
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with FAA, DoC official announcements

flagged_signals.title: COVID mRNA Vaccines May Enhance Cancer Immunotherapy
flagged_signals.recommendation: Track peer-reviewed publication of full study

flagged_signals.title: Latin America E-Commerce Disruption Creates Supply Chain Opportunities
issues: Indonesia GMV figure ($100B) seems misplaced in Latin America story

flagged_signals.title: Thailand's Digital Payments to Exceed $18.6B, Rivaling Singapore/Indonesia
University of Helsinki Develops Low-Temperature CO2 Capture Compound
issues: Technical claims need peer review verification
flagged_signals.recommendation: Verify with original Helsinki research publication

verified.criteria: Tier 1-2 source, pSRT >= 65, specific data with citations

partially_verified.criteria: Some credibility concerns but not critical
partially_verified.action: Include with caveat, monitor for confirmation

unverified.action: Exclude from primary report or flag prominently

immediate_actions.action: Remove or heavily caveat SIG-2026-0113-052 and SIG-2026-0113-053
immediate_actions.reason: Both signals from same low-tier source with specific statistics lacking methodology

immediate_actions.action: Add verification notes to 19 MEDIUM-risk signals in report
Upgrade source tracking for tier 3 sources
immediate_actions.reason: Multiple flags from same tier 3 sources indicate systematic quality issue

source_quality_improvements: Add 'Employer Branding News' to watch list for future verification requirements
Require primary source citation for specific statistics (percentages, dollar amounts)
Cross-validation protocol for market size projections
process_improvements: Implement dual-source requirement for claims with specific numbers
Flag signals with signal_score < 50 automatically for review
Add methodology verification step for market research projections

risk_assignment_logic.HIGH: pSRT < 60 indicates systematic quality issues across all dimensions
risk_assignment_logic.MEDIUM: Individual dimension weakness but overall acceptable with verification

next_steps: Phase 3: Generate final report with risk flags incorporated
Archive unverified signals for future re-evaluation
Update source quality database with findings
